about_the_game:
This is a welfare game that simulates the barrage interaction sent in the live broadcast room.
In the upper left corner of the game's main interface, you can switch languages.
After the game starts, players will enter an extremely weird live broadcast room...
The female anchor Yang Yinghan is 29 years old this year, and today she is going to cooperate with a white-haired uncle in a live broadcast, and two red ropes extend in the distance and are tied to her wrists, and she twists her body very skillfully......
Enter text in the blank box in the lower right corner, click the send barrage button, the text you enter will be displayed on the left side of the screen and scroll to the right, and each barrage sent will accumulate a little experience points.
When you send a barrage, there will be more barrages to interact with you, and if you don't send a barrage for more than 10 seconds, the number of barrages in the live broadcast room will decrease.
When you accumulate a certain amount of experience points, click the situation button in the lower left corner, and you will see the intimate video of the female anchor and the white-haired uncle, and there will be a lot of barrage in the live broadcast room. Let's send a barrage! Experience points will increase rapidly!
Scenario 1: Yang Yinghan gasped softly, she picked up the syringe and injected a mysterious red liquid into her thigh, and the white-haired uncle rushed behind her, and the two let out a pleasant gasp......
Scenario 2: Yang Yinghan is lying quietly on the bed, with a white scarf on her face, as if she is asleep, and the white-haired uncle slowly approaches and presses the jade man under him......
Scenario 3: Yang Yinghan's hands are tied with red ropes again, she is facing away from the camera, twisting her plump buttocks, and the white-haired uncle raises his hands high and leans forward......
Scenario 4: Yang Yinghan not only tied a red rope with her hands, but also a red rope around her neck, and the rope was tightly pulled by the white-haired uncle, so Yang Yinghan could only sit down slowly......

content_descriptors.notes:
Adults over 18 years old only.
There is sexual assault/non-consensual sex scene，Including tied ropes, silk scarves to cover the eyes.
There is no drug/alcohol abuse but a syringe with red unknown liquid for passion.
No self-harm, or suicide.

name: Camgirl Ying

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: win 7/win 10
  • Processor: inter i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: STG-2000X
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: win 7/win 10
  • Processor: inter i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GF4-Ti4200
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: A casual game that simulates live video streaming. How to play: Send text barrage to gain experience points. Tap to unleash special situations to gain excess experience points and unlock more special situations. Upgrades are fast. The graphics are beautiful. The feeling is full.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian*, French*, Russian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
